title: Unboxing the new HP Elite Folio
author: sponsored
summary: Limitless mobility and productivity with the world's first pull-forward business convertible
article: The HP Elite Folio was created for professionals on the go who are balancing life and work every day. Featuring a pull-forward form factor with a flexible, magnesium unibody design and vegan leather wrap. It’s the perfect size for portability, but packs a lot of super sized features. Here’s Tefty with first hand impressions with the Elite Folio.
The keyboard feels premium and designed to be quiet on calls. The vegan leather feels excellent.
For more information on pricing and availability visit HP.com
